title: Learning Objective Design Process Based on Cognitive Task Analysis (ACTA)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational math concepts and core principles of instructional design
context.additional_context: VR simulation-based math education design competency enhancement for professionals in healthcare/legal/technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cognitive processes required for setting math learning goals in three or more stages using the ACTA methodology
Learners can establish math curriculum objectives by applying a systematic process (learner needs analysis → goal definition → assessment design) in a simulation environment
Learners can revise and improve learning objectives at least twice by incorporating peer feedback through VR-based collaborative tasks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
